message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. That's the price I'm willing to pay for it.
Hi Bob, I understand your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $95.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time and sell the product to you for $92.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $88 for the product.
